sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO calendar VALUES(CALENDAR_SEQ.NEXTVAL, 101, #cal_conn#, #cal_title#, TO_DATE(#cal_sdate#), TO_DATE(#cal_edate#))
sqlMap.select: select CAL_NUM, EMP_ID, CAL_CONN, CAL_TITLE, TO_CHAR(CAL_SDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') CAL_SDATE , TO_CHAR(CAL_EDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') CAL_EDATE from calendar where TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(CAL_SDATE, 'YYYY'))= $nYear$ AND TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(CAL_SDATE, 'MM'))= $nMonth$ AND TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(CAL_SDATE, 'DD'))= $inputDate$

select CAL_CONN clickCont, CAL_TITLE clickTitle, cal_num from calendar where TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(CAL_SDATE, 'YYYY'))= $clickYear$ AND TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(CAL_SDATE, 'MM'))= $clickMonth$ AND TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(CAL_SDATE, 'DD'))= $clickDay$
sqlMap.update: update calendar set CAL_TITLE = #cal_title#, CAL_CONN = #cal_conn# where CAL_NUM = $cal_num$
